programme.title: Dia dos Mortos, (1985, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrneo na Flrida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenas entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Batalha dos Zumbis, (2019, Horror)
programme.desc: Alguns anos depois do caos econmico na Crocia, o mundo mudou e agora a gua rara e valiosa, e uma epidemia zumbi assola a Europa. O bon vivant Mico finalmente conhece sua estrela de cinema favorita, mas eles tero que lutar juntos para sobreviver.

programme.title: O Ataque do Tubaro de 6 Cabeas, (2018, Creature Features)

programme.title: Apocalipse Zumbi, (2011, Horror)
programme.desc: Meses depois que uma praga de zumbis exterminou 90% da populao americana, um pequeno grupo de sobreviventes abre caminho pelo pas em busca de um refgio na ilha de Catalina.

programme.title: Pegadas na neve, (2020, Creature Features)

programme.title: Narak est tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak v que o jogo foi virado, ele foge.

programme.title: Dr. Who: Daleks' Invasion Earth 2150 A.D., (1998, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the year 2150, the Earth is subjected to a ferocious Dalek invasion, bombarded with meteorites and cosmic rays. A brilliant scientist, Dr. Who, is transported into the future by a time and space machine. He arrives determined to destroy the Daleks

programme.title: Carnival of Souls, (1962, Horror Classics)

programme.title: Kill Zone 2, (2015, Action)

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.title: Stand Up Guys, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: Oscar winners Al Pacino, Christopher Walken, and Alan Arkin star in this action-comedy about retired gangsters who reunite for one last epic night.

programme.title: Cop Land, (1997, Thriller)
programme.desc: Director James Mangold (FORD vs FERRARI) extends his crime thriller classic that brings together a powerhouse cast, including Robert De Niro, Sylvester Stallone, Ray Liotta, and Harvey Keitel.

programme.title: Life of Crime, (2014, Action)
programme.desc: A pampered housewife (Jennifer Aniston) is kidnapped by a pair of blundering ex-cons in an effort to extort money from her sleazy real-estate tycoon husband (Tim Robbins).

programme.desc: A grisly homicide, a sensational trial, a forbidden affair it's JAGGED EDGE, a razor-sharp suspense thriller about crime, punishment and passion. Jeff Bridges is the prime suspect and Glenn Close plays the attorney who falls in love with him. rated -R

programme.title: 88 Minutes, (2007, Crime)

programme.desc: Planning to retire and begin a new life, Mr. X (Daniel Craig, Lara Croft: Tomb Raider), a successful West End drug dealer, has been asked for one last favor: to negotiate the sale of one million hits of Ecstasy. Rated: R

programme.title: Fist of Fury, (1972, Action)

programme.title: The Limey, (1999, Thriller)
programme.desc: Upon his release from prison, an extremely volatile and dangerous ex-con travels from England to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his estranged daughter's "accidental" death.

programme.title: Memento, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

programme.title: Payback, (1999, Action)
programme.desc: After a successful heist, Porter is left for dead. Once he recovers, he seeks vengeance and wants his share of the money.

programme.desc: Blake Lively and Jude Law star in this action-packed thriller from the producers of James Bond. After finding out her family's death was not an accident, Stephanie (Lively) transforms from victim to assassin, seeking revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: Hard Candy, (2005, Crime)

programme.title: The Peacemaker, (1996, Action)

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.desc: Set in the Depression era of the 1930s, a young woman and three men rob trains and plan a kidnapping. The men are caught and the woman becomes a prostitute. Based on "Sister of the Road" by Boxcar Bertha Thomson as told to Ben L. Reitman.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Mr. Majestyk, (1974, Action)
programme.desc: Charles Bronson stars as an ex-con and Vietnam vet whose efforts to run a straight business soon have him locking horns with both the law and the mafia in this explosive tale of backwoods revenge.

programme.title: The Conversation, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Coppola's provoking mystery-drama in which Harry Caul, expert surveillance man, hears something disturbing in his recording of a young couple in a park. He worries about what the tape may be used for and becomes involved in a maze of secrecy and murder.

programme.title: Rancho Deluxe, (1975, Western)
programme.desc: Jack (Jeff Bridges) and Cecil (Sam Waterston) are an oddball team of modern-day Montana cattle rustlers, and theyve set their sights on a pair of unlikely ranch owners from New York (Clifton James, Elizabeth Ashley). But can they outfox the foxes?

programme.title: Harold and Maude, (1971, Comedy)
programme.desc: A classic cult film that features one of the screen's most unlikely pairs. It will defy everything you've ever seen or known about screen lovers.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Comedy)

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Comedy)

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel thirty thousand feet in the air as Alister squares off against Kaiba on top of an airplane.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Alister dispatches his airborne arsenal Air Fortress Ziggurat! How can Kaiba defeat a monster the size of the plane itself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Dartz has taken over KaibaCorp! Can Kaiba, with Yugi's help, break into his own company which he's protected with the latest in security technology?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! The Dark Side of Dimensions
programme.desc: The stakes have never been higher, the rivalries never as fierce, the risks never so great. One wrong move - one card short - and it's game over for good.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi is eliminated from the tournament, KaibaCorp's crooked Board of Directors will transfer control of the company from Kaiba to Pegasus! Kaiba's brother Mokuba challenges Yugi to a duel to protect his brother's company!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi must duel a magical doppelganger of Kaiba, created from the greed and power lust Yugi wiped from Kaiba's soul.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi defeats the Blue Eyes White Dragon, but there are two more waiting in the wings! Will the real Kaiba reach Yugi in time to help beat this impersonator?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey decides to battle Rex Raptor without his friends' help to prove that he is man enough to take care of Serenity on his own.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey duels valiantly, but Rex Raptor has unleashed his secret weapon: the Red-Eyes Black Dragon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring's dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus's hired duelist Panik cheats Mai of all her star chips, and Yugi vows to defeat him and win them back. But when Panik's Castle of Dark Illusions enshrouds his monsters in a black mist, how can Yugi defeat an enemy he cannot see?
programme.sub-title: The Light at the End of the Tunnel

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Despite his astonishing disadvantage, Yugi boldly provokes Panik - "I'll finish you in three turns." Is Yugi bluffing, or does he have the advantage in this battle of wits?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba descends to the kingdom to face Pegasus. Has Kaiba changed since his battle with Yugi, or is he still the same merciless duelist? A battle between Kaiba's Blue Eyes White Dragon and Joey's Red Eyes Black Dragon holds the answers!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bandit Keith's gang kidnaps Joey to a secret cave with a graveyard playing field. As Yugi and friends search for him, Joey faces Bandit Keith's zombie monsters which become stronger as they return from the grave!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey's last-ditch effort, his lucky Time Wizard card, fails against Bandit Keith's zombie monsters. But as his lucky streak comes to an end, will his improving skills as a duelist and his love for his sister inspire him to victory?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey band together in a team battle against the Paradox Brothers with all the Star Chips and entrance to Pegasus's castle on the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Paradox Brothers summon the almighty Gate Guardian, a monster that reflects all attacks! Is Joey helping Yugi in this duel, or is his lack of experience sealing their fate for defeat?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Joey each unleash their strongest monster, the Summoned Skull, and the Red-Eyes Black Dragon, but their strength pales in comparison to the tremendous power of the Gate Guardian.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In order to earn the right to challenge Pegasus, Kaiba must first beat Yugi and take his Star Chips. The rematch between Yugi and Kaiba is about to begin!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, the strongest monster in the game fused from three Blue-Eyes White Dragons! Yugi has lost all his powerful Duel Monsters, but a true duelist never gives up!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi begins spinning a strategy to put the Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon to rest, but he must decide whether to claim victory or spare Kaiba his life. Yugi's heart is split in two!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Having lost his star chips to Kaiba and his only opportunity to save Grandpa, Yugi is in a state of shock. Can Tea bring Yugi back to consciousness by defeating Mai for her extra star chips and teach Yugi the heart of the duelist?

programme.title: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ELIMINATED FRIENDS - THE FINAL DAY OF THE STRAW HAT CREW

programme.title: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / BOSS LUFFY APPEARS AGAIN

programme.title: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FEUDAL ERA SIDE STORY / DEFEAT THRILLER COMPANY'S TRAP!

programme.title: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LANDING! THE ALL-FEMALE ISLAND, AMAZON LILY

programme.title: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HURRY BACK TO YOUR FRIENDS! THE MAIDEN ISLAND ADVENTURE

programme.title: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: EVERYONE FALLS IN LOVE! PIRATE EMPRESS HANCOCK

programme.title: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SECRET HIDDEN ON THE BACKS / LUFFY AND THE SNAKE PRINCESS MEET

programme.title: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HEARTLESS JUDGMENT! MARGARET IS TURNED TO STONE!!

programme.title: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DIFFICULT FIGHT FOR LUFFY! THE SNAKE SISTERS' HAKI POWER!!

programme.title: Luffy kicks his attack mode into Second Gear to save a precious statue, and the snake sisters start to feel the Straw Hat heat. At the battle's climax, Luffy makes an impression on his opponents.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: ALL-OUT SPECIAL POWER BATTLE!! GUM-GUM VS. SNAKE-SNAKE

programme.title: News of Luffy's run-in with the Celestial Dragons impresses the Snake Princess, so she tells him the story of her tortured past. Will his honorable nature speed Luffy toward a reunion with his crew?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: HANCOCK'S CONFESSION-- THE SISTERS' ABHORRENT PAST

programme.title: Luffy is mobbed by a hoard of pretty Kuja women eager to touch a real live man. Granny Nyon offers him a safe haven, but what she has to say might sink his plans for a Straw Hat reunion.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: SAVING ACE! THE NEXT STOP: THE GREAT PRISON

programme.title: Boa Hancock's illness threatens to sabotage Luffy's rescue mission. However, the Snake Princess just can't say "no" to the rubber-man, so a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: LOVE IS A HURRICANE! LOVE-LOVE HANCOCK

programme.title: While Luffy races to save Ace, Nami tries to survive life on Sky Island, and Franky dances up a snowstorm before making the switch from cola to tea!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! THE SCIENCE OF WEATHER AND THE MECHANICAL ISLAND

programme.title: Chopper narrowly avoids being served for dinner in a land inhabited by giant birds, and Sanji's refined tastes land him a role as a leading lady on the island of girlish hearts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! AN ISLAND OF GIANT BIRDS AND A PINK PARADISE!

programme.title: Nico Robin finds herself trapped on the island of Tequila Wolf: a miserable land where children are forced to work as slaves. Elsewhere, Usopp tries to survive a run-in with a man-eating plant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! BRIDGING THE ISLANDS AND VICIOUS VEGETATION!

programme.title: Zoro is held against his will by the pink-haired princess of bad vibes, Brook gets mistaken for the king of darkness, and Luffy continues to eat his way toward a reunion with Fire-Fist Ace!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE FRIENDS' WHEREABOUTS! A NEGATIVE PRINCESS AND THE KING OF DEMONS!

programme.title: Luffy and Boa arrive at Impel Down, but only thirty-three hours remain until Ace's execution. To save him, the Snake Princess must find a way to hide Luffy during her full-body search!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A DEADLY INFILTRATION! THE UNDERWATER PRISON IMPEL DOWN

programme.title: Time is running out on Ace, so Luffy teams up with a scoundrel who's going to pieces trying to escape Impel Down. There's no love lost between the former foes, but they'd better work together if they want to survive.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A REUNION IN HELL?! THE MAN WHO ATE THE CHOP-CHOP FRUIT!

programme.title: Luffy must part ways with a priceless treasure map before Buggy the Clown agrees to lead him through the bloody tangle of Blade Trees and Spike Needle Grass that make up Impel Down's Crimson Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: BREAK THROUGH THE CRIMSON HELL! BUGGY'S CHAOS-INDUCING PLAN

programme.title: Luffy and Buggy the Clown could end up as hippo food if they aren't careful in Impel Down's Wild Beast Hell. Of course, the rubber-man might find that a better fate than dealing with the prison's putrid warden!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE STRONGEST MAN IN THE PRISON! POISON MAN MAGELLAN APPEARS

programme.title: Luffy and his crew stumble upon a most peculiar village when they hitch a ride on a fire-breathing beetle. The natives are petrified of pirates, but they welcome the Straw Hats with open arms!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / A GOLD LION'S AMBITION ON THE MOVE

programme.title: The citizens of Little East Blue throw in a feast in honor of the Straw Hats, but when the Amigo Pirates try to capture Boss the Beetle, Luffy and his crew will have to defend their new friends.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / LITTLE EAST BLUE IN DANGER

programme.title: Luffy, Zoro, and Sanji prepare to do battle on behalf of Boss the Beetle, but Captain Largo of the Amigo Pirates counters with a deadly arsenal of nets to put the Straw Hat brawlers on lock down!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A SPECIAL PRESENTATION RELATED TO THE MOVIE / THE FIERCE ONSLAUGHT OF THE AMIGO PIRATES

programme.title: Luffy kicks into Second Gear for his rematch with Largo, and Nami leads the islanders as they lay waste to the Amigo Pirates. Boss the Beetle may be safe for now, but someone sinister lurks behind the scenes.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Special Presentation Related to the Movie/ The Battle is on! Luffy Vs. Largo

programme.title: Luffy struggles to stay a step ahead of a prison patrol made up of hungry lions and poisonous scorpions! Meanwhile, Ace spends what could be his final hours swapping stories with a pirate who hates pirates.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Warlord in Prison Jimbei, The Honorable Pirate

programme.title: While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Trap of Chief Guard Saldeath - Level 3 Starvation Hell

programme.title: Boa Hancock uses her ample assets to buy some private time for a clandestine chat with Ace. Meanwhile, Luffy needs help from a graceful friend to escape the jaws of a hungry Sphinx!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Liberated Swan! Reunion! Bon Kurei

programme.title: Luffy and Bon are on the verge of reaching Level 4, but they didn't count on fighting a demonic, lightning-fast, devastatingly powerful Minotaur! To defeat this beast, they'll need help from a human candle and a deranged clown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Chief Warden Magellan Moves - The Net to Trap Straw Hat Is Complete!

programme.title: Luffy narrowly avoids a deadly dip in the boiling pool of blood, only to find himself face to face with Warden Magellan. Meanwhile, outside the prison walls, the marine fleet prepares for Whitebeard's onslaught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Preparations for War! A Decisive Battle in Level 4 - Blazing Hell

programme.title: Warden Magellan is a monster of a man with a penchant for poisoning prisoners. To rescue Ace, Luffy must go toe to toe with this toxic terror, but how do you defeat a foe who's deadly to the touch?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Magellan's Strength! Bon Kurei Flees Before His Enemy

programme.title: Luffy's daring assault on the venomous warden of Impel Down leaves him struggling to stand up, but despite the lethal poison breaking down his body, the rubber-man kicks his rescue mission into Second Gear!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: THE SHOWDOWN HAS COME! LUFFY'S DESPERATE LAST ATTACK!

programme.title: While Luffy hovers perilously on the verge of death, Bon Clay embarks on a suicidal rescue mission plagued by sub-zero temperatures and bloodthirsty wolves with a supremely savage disposition!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: FOR HIS FRIEND! BON CLAY'S DEADLY RESCUE ATTEMPT

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The painting "The First Supper" hides clues to an heirloom that Christ received from Virgin Mary. This painting has been kept by the clan of Judah for generations, and a woman named Nova knows where the painting is hidden.
programme.sub-title: The Secret of the First Supper

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Mona Lisa never leaves the Louvre Museum. Arsne Lupin tried unsuccessfully to steal her and Lupin III wants her for his collection, however, and fireworks ignite between him and Zenigata in charge of security.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On New Years Eve, Lupin is after is the Golden Treasure Ship at Mount Horai. It's said that the Seven Lucky Gods conferred this treasure, which is shown in public only once a year when the New Year's bell rings at the belfry of Kohoji Temple.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: As usual, Lupin is tossed to and fro by Fujiko. But a man named Buckingham comes to him and sells him "disguise chewing gum" for 50,000 dollars.
programme.sub-title: The Strategy of the Chewing Gum Disguise

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The island of Rabaul has many remains of Japanese casualties of the Pacific War. It's said that Captain Cook's secret treasure is hidden there, worth 1-billion pounds. Lupin and gang are after this treasure but they get attacked!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and gang break into the Bank of Stockholm but as usual, Fujiko tries to take the money all for herself. Lupin goes after her but she gets injured in an avalanche. She confesses to Lupin about the location of her most precious treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends search a month for the pirate Kid's treasure, but they are thwarted by an underground organization called the Red Ghost. Knowing something is afoot, Lupin sends Fujiko and Goemon to investigate.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin finds a piece of paper in a silk hat, an heirloom of Arsne Lupin. It's information regarding an opal statue of Venus, and since Lupin figures its ownership is his birthright, he heads to Gregoire's castle.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata acquires a pie-throwing gun, and is ordered to capture Lupin. Meanwhile, Lupin and Fujiko are discussing Napoleon's treasures. It's said that the key to solving the mystery of their whereabouts lies in a scarf made by Napoleon's assistant
programme.sub-title: An Unusual End to an Expedition for Napoleon's Treasure

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The young girl Francoise lives near Lupin; she watches Lupin and Fujiko talking, and falls for him. But her father scolds her and tells her to stay away from thieves, but Francoise devises a plan to approach Lupin anyway

programme.title: Lifeforce, (1985, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A frightening journey into the unknown awaits an Earthbound scout ship when it comes across an alien spacecraft of enormous proportions. Further investigation reveals a roomful of glass coffins containing the bodies of frozen creatures.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: The Crow: Salvation, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: Alex Corvis returns to the world of the living to solve the murder of a young woman that he was wrongly accused of.

programme.title: The Crow: Wicked Prayer, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The fourth film in the dark superhero franchise is an epic new action tale. After an ex-con tries to straighten out his life, he and his girlfriend are brutally murdered by a renegade gang. A mysterious crow brings him back for revenge and redemption.

programme.title: The Crow, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Visually stunning and action-packed, this hit movie, based on the comic book series, follows the return from the grave of a young rock guitarist who, along with his fiance, is brutally killed by a ruthless gang of criminals.

programme.title: The Crow: City of Angels, (1996, Science fiction)
programme.desc: This fast-moving, action-packed sequel to THE CROW follows the rise of murder victim Ashe Corven, brought back to life by a mysterious crow. With the help of a woman named Sarah, he exacts revenge on his killers one by one.

programme.title: Saga of Death Valley, (1939, Western)
programme.desc: Roy comes back to Death Valley to take over the ranch some years after his father had been murdered by the local bigwig who is extorting the ranchers by threatening to cut off their water supply.

programme.title: Robin Hood of the Pecos, (1941, Western)
programme.desc: It took some time after the Civil War for the South to recover. Towns imposed martial law to maintain order and the "good guys" banded together against the criminals.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman (2014), (1947, Western)
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

programme.title: Vera Cruz, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: In this epic Western, two shady mercenaries (Gary Cooper, Burt Lancaster) in Mexico during the 1866 revolution are hired to escort a Countess and her gold to the Mexican army in Vera Cruz and find themselves at odds with the armyand each other!

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: Man of the West, (1958, Western)
programme.desc: Screen legend Gary Cooper demonstrates why he will always be remembered as one of the most authentic stars of the screen. Capable yet vulnerable, Cooper's portrayal of a former outlaw whose past returns to haunt him ranks among his very best.

programme.title: Dakota, (1945, Western)
programme.desc: In 1871 Dakota, two crooked businessmen oppose the local wheat farmers and the railroad development, in order to control the town of Fargo.

programme.title: Johnny Guitar, (1954, Western)
programme.desc: Gambling house operator Vienna seeks control of a town as archrival Emma Small sets out to force Vienna out of town. The timely arrival of Johnny Guitar thwarts Emma's dark plans, but doesn't prevent a showdown between the women.

programme.title: In Old California, (1942, Western)
programme.desc: The Duke plays a young, ambitious pharmacist who moves into a brawling frontier town but locks horns with a local crime lord, bent on keeping the town for himself.

programme.title: Horsemen, (2008, Thriller)
programme.desc: A recently widowed detective still grieving over his wife's death discovers a shocking connection between himself and the suspects in a serial killing spree linked to the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse.

programme.title: Suspect Zero, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: An FBI agent, investigating the case of a murdered serial killer, finds himself on the trail of an avenging former agent who has dedicated himself to hunting down serial killers.

programme.title: Paycheck, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: Michael Jennings works on top-secret projects. After each job, his memory is erased. After his latest assignment, he is shocked to be told that he agreed to forfeit all payment, until he receives an envelope containing clues to his forgotten past.

programme.title: Sahara, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Two thrill-seeking adventurers cross paths with a beautiful doctor and they find themselves on the ultimate hunt for a treasure that claims all who seek it.

programme.title: The Time Machine, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th-century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.

programme.title: Penelope, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: She's young, she's rich, she's available - too bad she has a pig's nose. Christina Ricci and James McAvoy team in a modern fairy tale about finding perfect love, imperfections and all.

programme.title: Just Like Heaven, (2005, Romance)
programme.desc: He's convinced she's a spirit. She's convinced she's still alive. As they search for the truth of Elizabeth's past, their relationship changes from resentment to romance.

programme.title: Legally Blonde, (2001, Comedy)
programme.desc: Elle Woods has it all, but when her boyfriend goes to Harvard, Ellie rallies all her resources to get into Harvard Law. But law school is a far cry from the comforts of home. Elle must wage the battle of her life, for herself and for all blondes!

programme.title: The savage group led by Alpha confronts the Hilltop in a harrowing attempt to retrieve her daughter; a supply run for the Kingdom turns into a dangerous quest.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa and Usagi befriend a young painter named Kamoi at the park. Kamoi is visited by Cere-Cere, who asks the man to paint a portrait of her.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa is curious to know why Pegasus is reluctant to tell her where he came from. When she confronts Pegasus with the question, he disappears.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Palla-Pall turns Sailor Chibi Moon into an adult and Sailor Moon into a child. Chibi-Usa turns into shock when Pegasus can no longer hear her.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls begin to suspect that Chibi-Usa is in love. Eager to know who the boy is, they try to get Chibi-Usa to talk, but with little success.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends help set up the stage for the Coming of Age Day ceremony. They befriend four girls who are actually the Amazoness Quartet.

programme.desc: Strange spider webs begin to appear all across the Juban District. The girls notice that these webs are all originating from the Dead Moon Circus.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Nehelenia sets her plan in motion by starting a solar eclipse that will leave the world in eternal darkness.

programme.desc: The Dead Moon discovers that Sailor Chibi Moon was hiding Pegasus and captures her. Sailor Chibi Moon learns the history behind the Dead Moon's queen.

programme.desc: Nehelenia demands that Helios give up the Golden Crystal in exchange for Sailor Chibi Moon. The Sailor Guardians are struggling to defeat Zirconia.

programme.desc: Usagi and her friends start their new lives as high school girls. Nehalennia breaks out of her prison to seek revenge against the Sailor Guardians.

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The city is being plagued by a strange illness that causes people to become obsessed with staring into the mirror for hours, even days.

programme.desc: The entire school is possessed and drawn into the old schoolhouse, all to lure Satsuki and the gang into a trap. Lord Ohma has awoken, and seeks vengeance upon Satsuki for her family's past attempts to seal him.

programme.title: Ghost Stories

programme.title: Ghost Stories

programme.sub-title: The Curtain is Raised! The Cursed School Fine Arts Festival...

programme.title: Ghost Stories
